title: The cry and reuenge of blood Expressing the nature and haynousnesse of wilfull murther. Exemplified in a most lamentable history thereof, committed at Halsworth in High Suffolk, and lately conuicted at Bury assize, 1620.
author: Cooper, Thomas, fl. 1626.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Nicholas Okes, for Iohn Wright, dwelling in Pie-corner,
